actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: A resolution to express the sense of the House of Representatives that the United States should not participate in the games of the XXII Olympiad, scheduled to be held in Moscow, and that the President, together with the United States Olympic Committee, should make prompt recommendations for alternate sites for such games.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that: (1) the United States should not participate in the 1980 summer Olympic games in Moscow; and (2) the President and the U.S. Olympic Committee should recommend alternate sites for such games.

titles.title: A resolution to express the sense of the House of Representatives that the United States should not participate in the games of the XXII Olympiad, scheduled to be held in Moscow, and that the President, together with the United States Olympic Committee, should make prompt recommendations for alternate sites for such games.
